product_description: Pressboard Report Cover with Fastener by Ring Binder Depot (5 Pack, Blue) Pressboard Presentation Covers are ideal for long term storage of important documents. It has the solution for everything from professional client presentations, bids, sales proposals, and formal presentations to business casual internal meetings, project updates, or training and resource materials and data storage. These durable pressboard report covers are made of 20 point genuine pressboards. A fastener secures thin or thick documents, helping this cover to stack easily and lie flat. Pressboard Presentation Covers are made with 50% recycled content, 30% post-consumer material, providing a storage solution. name: Cardinal Economy 3-Ring Binders, 1", Round Rings, Holds 225 Sheets, ClearVue Presentation View, Non-Stick, White, Carton of 12 (90621)
short_description: 1 INCH ROUND RING BINDER: 1 inch round-ring binders hold up to 225 sheets, making it easy to organize notes, reports, handouts, and presentations; XtraLife hinges help avoid rips and tears, adding to the life of your binder

CLEARVUE PROFESSIONAL DESIGN: Clear overlays allow full binder customization, giving presentations, reports, and schoolwork a clear, polished look; view covers let you swap out inserts on the spine, front, and back of binder

2 CLEAR POCKETS FOR EXTRA PAPER: 2 interior pockets let you store extra sheets, notes, handouts, and more; non-stick interior prevents ink and toner from lifting or smudging; PVC-free material keeps documents clean and professional
LIGHTWEIGHT AND DURABLE FOR DAILY USE: Round-ring binders are made for dependable everyday use, opening and closing smoothly while holding papers securely in place
BULK 12 PACK FOR SCHOOL OR OFFICE: Convenient twelve-pack of white binders makes it easy to organize multiple subjects, projects, or departments while stocking up on Cardinal quality binders
product_description: Simple organization starts with supplies you can count on. Cardinal 1 Inch Presentation View Binders offer reliability and a clean, professional look, perfect for school, office, and home organization. Each white round ring binder holds up to 225 sheets, making it ideal for notes, reports, presentations, assignments, and reference materials. The classic 3-ring design keeps pages aligned and easy to turn, helping your paperwork stay neat and accessible. Reinforced XtraLife hinges help avoid rips and tears along the seams, adding to the longevity of your binders. With ClearVue covers, you can customize the front, spine, and back with title pages, making it easy to identify subjects or projects at a glance. The white exterior delivers a polished appearance that fits seamlessly into classrooms, offices, and professional settings. Made from non-stick, PVC-free materials, these binders protect your documents by preventing ink and toner from transferring onto covers. You can update or swap inserts anytime without worrying about smudges or lifted print. These 1 inch view binders have 2 inside pockets for storing extra paper. The bulk 12-pack offers excellent value, making it easy to stay stocked up on Cardinal binders. Simple, dependable, and thoughtfully designed, Cardinal binders help turn clutter into calm: one page at a time. (Manufacturer Item Number: 90621)
